I guess manners are important even after your dead ;)
Charm

Mick <micksghosts@...> wrote:          I've received 'hi's' from my general questions but one time I did receive an answer. I was sitting on a marker in a cemetery. I put my recorder on and asked if anyone was there. On the recording a woman asks 'who ARE you'? rather indignant. I guess I shouldn't have been sitting on her marker :-)

Mick

Zack Widup wrote:       
I liked one I got - someone asked "Do you want us to leave?" and the EVP 
voice said "You just got here!"

Zack

On Fri, 30 May 2008, Pridegrl Neverumind wrote:

> lol!
> one evp i heard- I forget whos it was.... the researcher said "is anyone here?"and the evp response said "tell her its Satan!"
> too funny! lol
> Charm
>
